thread.title: Rooms require renovation
thread.title_full: Rooms require renovation - Review of Ibis Budget Paris Porte de Pantin, Pantin, France - TripAdvisor

author: niraM83
title: Rooms require renovation
text: When arrived late night we got the room nr. 11, in the morning I have discovered that the shower hose was broken and I could hardly take a shower. When asked the reception to repair the shower hose, they proposed to switch to another room (nr. 404). The room was OK, excepting the door-lock that was shaking. When arrived next evening I have discovered that the door-lock was completely broken and the door was NOT LOCKED anymore. Luckily nothing has disappeared from the room.
